meanings.definition: Excessive blood in a part or organ.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hyperemias in his liver.
meanings.sent2: The hyperemias in her cheeks made her look flushed.
meanings.sent3: The hyperemias in the garden hose made it burst like a balloon!
meanings.sent4: The hyperemias of emotions flooded through her heart.
meanings.sent5: The hyperemias of paint on the canvas created a vibrant masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A condition of increased blood flow to an area.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's hyperemias in his muscles showed he had been working out.
meanings.sent2: The hyperemias in her face indicated a rise in body temperature.
meanings.sent3: The hyperemias in the traffic flow made the cars move faster than usual.
meanings.sent4: The hyperemias of ideas rushed through his mind during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The hyperemias of visitors to the park brought life to the once quiet space.
